Traits.Name: Stutter
Traits.Description: When a foe takes an action in range 3 of the ghast, it may teleport 1 and deal 1 damage to an adjacent foe.

Traits.Name: Hollow
Traits.Description: The Stutterghast has aura 1. While there is exactly 1 other character in hollow's aura, it has have evasion and stealth. This aura has no effect if no other characters, or 2 or more other characters are inside, and its effects (including stealth) turn off it if deactivates.

Interrupts.Name: Reality Break
Interrupts.Effect: The stutterghast becomes intangible until the end of its next turn.
